module.name: Text
module.author: Core
module.description: Add Text directly to a Layout

property.title: Enter text or HTML in the box below.
property.helpText: Enter the text to display. The red rectangle reflects the size of the region you are editing. Shift+Enter will drop a single line. Enter alone starts a new paragraph.

property.title: Background Colour
property.helpText: The selected effect works best with a background colour. Optionally add one here.

property.title: Effect
property.helpText: Please select the effect that will be used to transition between items.

property.title: Speed
property.helpText: The transition speed of the selected effect in milliseconds (normal = 1000) or the Marquee Speed in a low to high scale (normal = 1).

property.title: Marquee Selector
property.helpText: The selector to use for stacking marquee items in a line when scrolling Left/Right.
